entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Scrollview does not calculate ContentHeight correctly on ios #14986
  • [Windows] Adding and Removing ContextMenus currently does not work #14984
    .NET 8
  • MAUI - binding native iOS Swift library #14982
  • XamlCompilation attribute does not work (Windows 10) for xaml files in Platform -> Windows. "IN RELEASE MODE" #14981
  • Release build doesn't deploy on iOS/iPhone emulator #14979
  • iOS - Grouped CollectionView doesn't render properly when VerticalOptions = FillAndExpand #14978
  • iOS - MediaPicker.PickPhotoAsync() doesn't work if Limited permission (Selected Photos) for Photo Gallery #14973
    .NET 8
  • Impossible to add UseWindowsForms in a MAUI project #14970
  • Shell.SetTabBarIsVisible is not working WinUI #14969
  • CollectionView's VerticalOptions are not working as intended on iOS. #14966
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Android] Swapping the MainPage out with the same instance of FlyoutPage crashes the app #14866
    .NET 8
  • FlyoutPage crashes when FlyoutLayoutBehavior sets to Split on iPad #10291
    Backlog
  • FlyoutPage issues on iOS Tablets #7520
    Backlog
  • Android - Collectionview EmptyView not visible #10819
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [MacCatalyst] [iOS] Label goes out of the bounds of its parent when it has a bigger desired width than the parent constraints #14368
    Backlog
  • Label don't break (middletruncation) and overlap on the next grid's column #9084
    Backlog
  • Imagesource problem when page reload #14811

PullRequests

Created

  • Move Windows and iOS Frame measure and arrange to xplat layer #14987
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Workaround WinUI bug with adding/removing flyouts #14985
  • Fix ListView not Truncating Labels iOS #14983
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, layout-stack
  • Remove Controls Navigation Controller #14976
  • [Android] Fix issue invoking ReturnCommand #14972
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry

Merged

  • Remove view from previous containerview #14867
    platform/android 🤖, partner/cat 😻
  • Fix Layout issues with the details page on Flyout #12909
    t/breaking 💥, area/layout 🔲, partner/cat 😻, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [android] improve layout performance of Label #14980
    area/perf 🏎️, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Fix Label Truncation on iOS with HorizontalOptions #14453
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [android] reduce interop calls in MauiDrawable #14933
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • Update XamlParseExceptionConstraint.cs(removed unused method) #14971
    community ✨

Updated

  • Add the Platform* APIs for Graphics #14816
  • [uitests] Work for get appium uitests with CI #14488
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #14109
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • Make CollectionView on iOS measure to content size #14951
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] Fix crash swapping MainPage #14262
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭
  • [Windows] Align Button VisualStates behavior with other platforms #14381
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Fix issue in Entry Drawable using API Level 23 #14615
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [iOS] Normalize the orientation from MediaPicker photos #14568
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Correctly notify ImageButton border changes #14874
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [Android] Changes updating ImageButton Padding to avoid size issues #14905
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Controls(Android): fix frame background color #14917
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Windows] Apply different brushes by state (Normal, PointerOver, etc) #10782
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
